title: Corned beef hash
description: This is about as easy as you can get - cook this in batches and keep it warm in dishes covered with aluminium foil in a low oven.
ingredients: 7kg/15lb 4oz floury white potatoes, boiled and chopped into cubes
10 x 340g/12oz tins corned beef, chopped into cubes
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
